/circle6 Check if the baby is active/lethargic. 
C. Management/counselling
/circle6 Emphasise the importance of exclusive breastfeeding.
/circle6 Tell the mother that if the baby is having any of the following problems, he/she should 
be taken immediately to the MO at the FRU.
/lozenge6 Th  e baby is not accepting breastfeeds.
/lozenge6 He/she looks sick (lethargic or irritable). 
/lozenge6 Th  e baby has fever or feels cold to the touch.
/lozenge6 Th  e baby has convulsions.
